definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: There are also transsexuals who oppose any sex reassignment surgery.
sentences.chinese: 也有反对任何性别指派手术的易性癖者。

sentences.english: Reappointing one or more persons provides continuity.
sentences.chinese: 指派一位或多位的人员续任以提供持续性。

sentences.english: However, some organizations designate just one or two people to review change requests periodically.
sentences.chinese: 但是，某些企业只指派一两个人来定期复审变更请求。

sentences.english: A list of end users assigned to the project and their project schedules.
sentences.chinese: 指派给项目的终端用户列表及其项目时间表。

sentences.english: a laborer assigned to a section gang.
sentences.chinese: 被分配指派到工段养路班的劳工。

sentences.english: This time, each member has been assigned a task and a schedule.
sentences.chinese: 这次，每一位成员都被指派了一项任务和一份时间表。

sentences.english: The first test that runs might have a per-test time-out value assigned.
sentences.chinese: 执行的第一项测试可能已指派每个测试的逾时值。

sentences.english: The quadratic assignment problem (QAP) is one of the great challenges in combinatorial optimization.
sentences.chinese: 二次指派问题是组合优化领域最大的挑战之一。

sentences.english: It is recommended that each national Scout Organization appoint a national coordinator for JOTI.
sentences.chinese: 建议各国童军总会指派一人负责协调JOTI活动。

sentences.english: Organizers will assign volunteers to teams that need assistant for stage set-up.
sentences.chinese: 主办方将为那些需要帮助舞台搭建的队伍指派志愿者。

sentences.english: In NBA 2K12, any player in the game can be assigned as many as four different play types.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个球员都可以指派到四个不同的战术类型。

sentences.english: A competent person should be appointed to supervise and to control the whole evacuation procedure.
sentences.chinese: 应指派一名合资格人员，负责监控整个疏散程序。

sentences.english: This process effectively delegates transaction coordination to the one-phase commit resource.
sentences.chinese: 此过程有效地指派了对单阶段提交资源的事务协作。

sentences.english: Training will be performed by the site manager or their designee.
sentences.chinese: 培训将由现场经理或其指派的专员开展。

sentences.english: Describes how to assign a new name to a custom collection-level group.
sentences.chinese: 说明如何指派新名称给自订的集合层级群组。

sentences.english: Serves as verifier or delegates this responsibility to someone else.
sentences.chinese: 作为审核者或指派其他人承担该责任。

definition: to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to assign (a task to different people)/to allocate
to incite/to prompt (sb to do sth)
to select/to detail/to set apart/to appoint
